code: export var STAGE_WIDTH=12;export var STAGE_HEIGHT=20;export var createStage=function createStage(){return Array.from(Array(STAGE_HEIGHT),function(){return new Array(STAGE_WIDTH).fill([0,"clear"]);});};export var checkCollision=function checkCollision(player,stage,_ref){var moveX=_ref.x,moveY=_ref.y;for(var y=0;y<player.tetromino.length;y+=1){for(var x=0;x<player.tetromino[y].length;x+=1){if(player.tetromino[y][x]!==0){if(!stage[y+player.pos.y+moveY]||!stage[y+player.pos.y+moveY][x+player.pos.x+moveX]||stage[y+player.pos.y+moveY][x+player.pos.x+moveX][1]!=="clear"){return true;}}}}};
